issue.title: VMWare rendering: Z Ordering Appears Random

content.raw:
Worked for us @nkoenig.

Prior to fix:
![sim-94-depth.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/297169330-sim-94-depth.png)

Post-fix:
![sim-94-depth-with-gz7-4.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1363250248-sim-94-depth-with-gz7-4.png)

Note the floating objects behind the dumpster, which are visible prior but not visible post.  Also, the textures on those floating objects are now rendered, when they were not previously.  Good work!
content.html:
Worked for us @nkoenig.

Prior to fix:

Post-fix:

Note the floating objects behind the dumpster, which are visible prior but not visible post. Also, the textures on those floating objects are now rendered, when they were not previously. Good work!
